mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users (email, password_hash, name, is_active, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{email}, #{passwordHash}, #{name}, #{isActive}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT id, email, password_hash, name, is_active, created_at, updated_at FROM users WHERE id = #{id} AND is_active = TRUE
SELECT id, email, password_hash, name, is_active, created_at, updated_at FROM users WHERE email = #{email} AND is_active = TRUE
SELECT id, email, password_hash, name, is_active, created_at, updated_at FROM users WHERE is_active = TRUE ORDER BY created_at DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE users SET email = #{email}, name = #{name}, is_active = #{isActive}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
